content: pip s crochet corner octopus crochet pattern difficulty level piece of cake this octopus pattern is super easy and works up extremelyquickly only one color of yarn is used and it can be whatever kind of yarn you want i used bernat blanket yarn to make a bigger softer plush but i could see this patternin any other yarn this is a no sew pattern so it s perfect for beginners who aren t used to sewingpieces onto amigurumi it s also the perfect pattern for a last minute gift supplies needed ● yarn any kind in a small amount however i usedbernat blanket yarn ● crochet hook size depends on yarn used i m usinga 5 5 mm ● safety eyes i m using 12 mm ● stuffing ● scissors ● tapestry needle ● stitch marker optional notes ● this pattern is worked in continuous rounds unlessotherwise stated let s start round 1 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring round 2 increase in every st around 12 round 3 single_crochet increase repeat around 18 round 4 single_crochet 2 increase repeat around 24 round 5 single_crochet 3 increase repeat around 30 round 6-11 single_crochet around 30 round 12 single_crochet 3 decrease repeat around 24 round 13 in blo single_crochet 2 decrease repeat around 18 insert safety eyes between rounds 10 and 11 about3 stitches apart begin stuffing your octopus round 14 single_crochet decrease repeat around 12 round 15 decrease in every st around 6 2 fasten_off weave close opening using tapestry needle insert your hook into the front loop of round 13 single_crochet double_crochet single_crochet in each stitch around fasten_off 3 congrats you re done don t forget to tag
